record.dc:title: 5McL11, 15McL11, McLean, Kentucky. Ward Site. 220 foot Profile.
record.wpa:narrative: Photograph taken fifty feet to the south of the 220' profile and from the photographic tower which was twenty-five feet high. Horizontal lines indicate firts, the flowline, and secondly the lower margin of the dark soil of the Habitation Level. On the downhill side of the profile these two coincide, but proceeding toward the western side of the profile (that is, uphill) the dark soil becomes progressively thicker. Proceeding from left to right the Features apparent in the profile are the follwoing: Feature #5 (a small inclusive pit); Feature #6 (a small inclusive pit); Feature #7 (a moderate sized inclusive pit); Feature #8 (a large inclusive pit).
